docs.snippet: Microsoft Corp on Thursday said it proposed a program to U.S. President Donald Trump's administration allowing people from seven predominantly Muslim nations to enter and leave the United States on business or family emergency travel if they hold ...
docs.lead_paragraph: Microsoft Corp on Thursday said it proposed a program to U.S. President Donald Trump's administration allowing people from seven predominantly Muslim nations to enter and leave the United States on business or family emergency travel if they hold valid work or student visas and have not committed any crimes.

headline.main: Microsoft Asks for Exception Program on Trump Immigration Orders
headline.print_headline: Microsoft Asks for Exception Program on Trump Immigration Orders
